name: VoiceExpressConnect
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: voice express connect
des:
The Voice Express Connect Skill is a companion to the Connect Brochure in-print and permits a user to access and share the same information that is delivered in the brochure on a smart speaker. 

This Skill is also a wonderful example of the type of companion Skill that comes with every Connect campaign. It demonstrates how recipients of the Connect Brochure can access the same information as contained in the card.... plus any additional information that the sponsor desires to add. Keep in mind, that while the information contained on a Connect Brochure is finite, the information in the companion Alexa Skill is infinite. The Connect Companion Skill may be refreshed and expanded ….. on a regular basis. The Connect Companion Skill may even be made a part of the user’s Daily Briefing on their Echo Device. … Now that’s what we call Connecting!

Depending on your area of interest, you can call or send a text message (“Direct Mail”, “POS” or Unbox”) to 888-997-5264
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
